original_title: อีส้ม สมหวัง ชะชะช่า
overview: Somwang and Som are living the dream as he becomes a successful singer and she becomes a dancer. But life is far from perfect, for with the good comes the bad. With Somwangnew found fame, it is hard for him to focus on the relationship with Som. Will he be able to balance his dream and his love?or will he have to choose one or the other?
title: In Country Melody 2
